title: Quilt, mid- 19th century
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: Marseilles-style white quilt with elaborate floral borders with pineapple and foliage in a symmetrical arrangement. Four double-headed eagles in the center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Quilt, mid- 19th century.
mid- 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: machine quilted. Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell. 1956-42-71.
